settings.text:
Fill out the form at the bottom of the page to start.

Consignment Terms:

Consignment Period: 90 days

Consignment Fee: 30% for items under $5000. You keep 70%.
25% for items over $5000. You keep 75%.

Shipping & Authentication Process: We will provide a free shipping label to you once you the Consignment Agreement with the quoted prices. We reserve the right to reject any items that cannot be authenticated. Once the item has been authenticated and approved, you will receive a confirmation indicating that our consignment agreement is in effect.

Consignment Period: During this amount of time, we will hold the items your items for sale, and they cannot be withdrawn. After the Consignment Period has concluded and the item has not sold, it may be reclaimed by you.
